original_text:
CLAUSE 3: D
Risk Level: standard Word Count: 55
EPOSIT: The lessee has paid sum of Rs. 1,00,000/- (Rupees One Lakh Only)
by the way online transfer to the Owner towards the security deposit. The said
. amount shall not bear any interest and the owner will refund the same to the
tenant at the time of vacating and handing over the schedule premises.
plain_english: This payment requires compliance with specific requirements.
user_impact: You must follow these medium-risk requirements or face consequences.
risk_reason: Score: 12. Factors: interest(5), deposit(3), security deposit(4)
